title: The Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament do declare, that by reason of the extraordinary and important affairs of the kingdom, there will be no proceedings this next Easter-term  ...
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: printed by Edward Husbands and Thomas Newcomb, printers to the Commons House of Parliament,
notes: Order to print dated: Saturday May 5, 1660.
Steele notation: Arms 60  De- Bars Peo-.
"Easter term at Westminster postponed till Quinque Pasche  28 May. No trials at Bar this Easter term."--Steele.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
